mapper.select: select * from xzs.t_exam_paper where (deleted = 0 and paper_type = 1 and grade_level = #{level}) and (create_user = 'admin' or create_user = #{userName})
select * from xzs.t_exam_paper where (deleted = 0 and paper_type = 4 and grade_level = #{level}) and (create_user = 'admin' or create_user = #{userName})
